channel.title: SPECIAL WEAPONS! D CLAWS! HELP!(You Might Have The Same Problem)
channel.description: okay so i was putting dragon claws on my deltascape source. i got the specials all good and everything,but when i go to use it, i hit a 0 and then a number. i have never hit 2 different hits in 1 spec and its suppose to hit 2 times. so for example, the specs would be like 0,4 or 0,21 or like 0,19 and 1 last thing.when i do a special. it hits my character with the same number as i hit on the npc, but not real damage,just like a fake attack in a way. anyone help me!?! :confused: :confused: :confused: :confused: :confused: ;D ;D

item.title: SPECIAL WEAPONS! D CLAWS! HELP!(You Might Have The Same Problem)
item.dc:creator: @alanpwns alanpwns
item.description:
@alanpwns wrote:

I made this one for on players: ( only hit 2 times, but you can fix i think )
Code:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 13664 && specialAmount > 49){
specialAtk(true, 50, 274, 0x426);
getHit(10);
setAnimation(2068);
usingSpecial = true;
}

This one on npc:
Code:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 13664 && specialAmount > 49){
specialAtkNPC(true, 50, 274, 0x426);
setAnimation(2068);
npcDamage(10);
}

The 13664 is my dragon claws ID.
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 26, 2009, 05:03:45 pm[/size][hr]and i went in specials.java and added 13664.

Read full topic
item.source: SPECIAL WEAPONS! D CLAWS! HELP!(You Might Have The Same Problem)
